ModInfo.Name: Sheepy's Machine Gun 3 Round Burst
ModInfo.Author: Sheepy
ModInfo.Description:
Add 3-round burst to machine guns, that is more accurate. Its is intended to argument, not replace, the full burst.
As a side effect, machine guns' full burst now fires 3 volleys of 3 bullets, and a 10/10 clip means 10 volleys. Suppression is unaffected.
Mod home: https://github.com/Sheep-y/xenonauts-stm
